card: background-color: white; color: black; border-color: rgb(211, 211, 211);
default-button: QPushButton { color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: rgb(239, 239, 239); padding: 0.25em; border: none;} QPushButton:hover { background-color: qlineargradient(spread:pad, x1:0.5, y1:0, x2:0.5, y2:1, stop:0 rgba(239, 239, 239, 120), stop:1 rgba(239, 239, 239, 200)); }
default-rounded-button: QPushButton { color: rgb(0, 0, 0); border-radius: 20px; background: rgb(222, 221, 218); padding: 5px; } QPushButton:hover { background-color: qlineargradient(spread:pad, x1:0.5, y1:0, x2:0.5, y2:1, stop:0 rgba(222, 221, 218, 90), stop:1 rgba(222, 221, 218, 180)); }
primary-button: QPushButton { color: rgb(255, 255, 255); background-color: rgb(53, 132, 228); padding: 0.25em; border: none;} QPushButton:hover { background-color: qlineargradient(spread:pad, x1:0.5, y1:0, x2:0.5, y2:1, stop:0 rgba(53, 132, 228, 60), stop:1 rgba(53, 132, 228, 200)); }
primary-rounded-button: QPushButton { color: rgb(255, 255, 255); border-radius: 20px; background: rgb(53, 132, 228); padding: 5px; } QPushButton:hover { background-color: qlineargradient(spread:pad, x1:0.5, y1:0, x2:0.5, y2:1, stop:0 rgba(53, 132, 228, 90), stop:1 rgba(53, 132, 228, 180)); }
toolbar: QToolBar { background-color:rgb(26, 98, 113); color:rgb(255,255,255); } QToolBar:left { padding: 0; margin: 0; } QToolBar:right { padding: 0; margin: 0; } QToolButton { background-color:rgb(26, 98, 113); color:rgb(255,255,255); margin-top: 8px; width: 100%; min-width: 80px; }
alert-primary: QLabel { background-color: #CFE2FF; color: #0A4499; padding: 1rem; border: 1px solid #B6D4FE; border-radius: 0.25rem; }
alert-secondary: QLabel { background-color: #E2E3E5; color: #41464B; padding: 1rem; border: 1px solid #D3D6D8; border-radius: 0.25rem; }
alert-success: QLabel { background-color: #D1E7DD; color: #0F5132; padding: 1rem; border: 1px solid #BADBCC; border-radius: 0.25rem; }
alert-danger: QLabel {background-color: #F8D7DA; color: #842029; padding: 1rem; border: 1px solid #F5C2C7; border-radius: 0.25rem;}
alert-warning: QLabel { background-color: #FFF3CD; color: #664D03; padding: 1rem; border: 1px solid #FFECB5; border-radius: 0.25rem; }
alert-information: QLabel { background-color: #CFF4FC; color: #055160; padding: 1rem; border: 1px solid #B6EFFB; border-radius: 0.25rem; }
alert-light: QLabel { background-color: #FEFEFE; color: #636464; padding: 1rem; border: 1px solid #FDFDFE; border-radius: 0.25rem; }
alert-dark: QLabel { background-color: #D3D3D4; color: #141619; padding: 1rem; border: 1px solid #BCBEBF; border-radius: 0.25rem; }
table: QTableView { background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); alternate-background-color: rgba(173, 216, 230, 55); color: rgb(0, 0, 0); border: 0; } QHeaderView { background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); } QHeaderView::section { border: none; padding-left: 0.25em; }
